00034 #include "../portability/affy-base-types.h"
00035 #include "CHPFileData.h"
00036 
00037 #define MAX_BUFFER_SIZE                         5242880         // 5 MB
00038 
00039 namespace affxchpwriter
00040 {
00041 class CCHPFileBufferWriter
00042 {
00043         class GenotypeBufferEntry
00044         {
00045         public:
00046                 uint8_t call;
00047                 float confidence;
00048                 float RAS1;
00049                 float RAS2;
00050                 float aaCall;
00051                 float abCall;
00052                 float bbCall;
00053                 float noCall;
00054         };
00055 
00056         class ExpressionBufferEntry
00057         {
00058         public:
00059                 unsigned char Detection;
00060                 float DetectionPValue;
00061                 float Signal; 
00062                 unsigned short NumPairs;
00063                 unsigned short NumUsedPairs;
00064         };
00065 
00066 public:
00068         CCHPFileBufferWriter();
00069 
00071         ~CCHPFileBufferWriter();
00072 
00074         void SetMaxBufferSize(int MaxBufferSize) { m_MaxBufferSize = MaxBufferSize; }
00075 
00077         void Cleanup();
00078 
00083         void Initialize(std::vector<std::string> *CHPFileNames, bool IsGenotype);
00084 
00089         void WriteGenotypeEntry(int target, affxchp::CGenotypeProbeSetResults &entry);
00090 
00095         void WriteExpressionEntry(int target, affxchp::CExpressionProbeSetResults &entry);
00096 
00098         void FlushBuffer();
00099 
00100 private:
00101         // Pointer to list of CHP file names.
00102         std::vector<std::string> *m_CHPFileNames;
00103 
00104         // List of targets used for storing genotype entries.
00105         std::vector< std::vector<GenotypeBufferEntry> > m_TargetGenotypeEntryBuffers;
00106 
00107         // List of targets used for storing expression entries.
00108         std::vector< std::vector<ExpressionBufferEntry> > m_TargetExpressionEntryBuffers;
00109 
00110         // Buffer for storing genotype entry row indexes.
00111         std::vector<int> m_TargetEntryRowIndexes;
00112 
00113         // Size of the current buffer in bytes.
00114         int m_BufferSize;
00115 
00116         // Maximum size of the buffer before it gets flushed
00117         int m_MaxBufferSize;
00118 
00119         // Genotype or Expression
00120         bool m_IsGenotype;
00121 };
